record.field: You can not change the Feed Product of Prescription Template "%(template)s" because there are products or prescriptions already related to this template.\nPlease, create a new template.
Current values of prescription "%(prescription)s" will be replaced.
Lot is required to set done the prescription "%(prescription)s".
The lot "%(lot)s" used in prescription "%(prescription)s" has expired.
Veterinarian is requried to confirm the prescription "%(prescription)s".
The prescription "%(prescription)s" must have at least one line in order to be confirmed.
The Stock Move "%(move)s" has the Prescription Line "%(origin)s" as origin, but it isn't related to a Prescription or it isn't the origin's prescription.
The Stock Move "%(move)s" has the Prescription Line "%(origin)s" as origin, but the product and/or quantity are not the same.
The Stock Move "%(move)s" is related to Prescription "%(prescription)s", but the product and/or quantity are not the same.
Prescription "%(prescription)s" of move "%(move)s" must be confirmed before assigning the move.
The prescription "%(prescription)s" is used in internal shipment "%(shipment)s".
